channel.title: FlawlScape V4
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/snmkai4kopie.png[/img]
[img]http://runekeep.com/playnow.png[/img] Play Now | [URL=http://www.flawlscape.com/client.php]FlawlScape[/URL] [img]http://shady-scape.com/images/VisionBB/toplinks/forumsrq.png[/img] Forums | [URL=http://www.flawlscape.com]FlawlScape[/URL]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][URL=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/77269664/The%20Original%20FlawlScape.rar]Download Client[/URL][img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img]
___________________________________________________________________________
Beginner's Guide Video (Thanks to RmProduction for creating & editing the video!) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FVPQIJr-_7g&feature=youtu.be
To watch PK Videos, simply search for 'FlawlScape V4 PKing' on Youtube!
___________________________________________________________________________
FlawlScape is a server focused mostly on PKing. To ensure awesome PKing experiences, we do have smoothly switching for briders, perfectly working specials and the newest PK items like Chaotic Weapons or Nex gears. In addition we have a PK shop in which you can buy items like Godswords, also we have an EP drops system which works exactly as it did on RuneScape.
[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/Bez-nzvu-1.gif[/img] ___________________________________________________________________________
[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/Animation23.gif[/img]
___________________________________________________________________________ [IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n3e.jpg[/img]
We're having friendly and active staff you may always ask when having a problem or chat with when you feel like talking. What's special about us, is that we try our best to pay attention to the players' opinions and suggestions, rather than what WE want.
___________________________________________________________________________
Apart of our decent PvP system, we also offer PvM also against Bossmonsters like Tormented Demons, the Corporeal Beast or the Gwd Monsters.
[IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n4e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n1e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n6e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n5e.jpg[/img]
___________________________________________________________________________
In general we also have a few customized Interfaces to increase the gameplay of our players even more.
Player Information menu | Custom Options menu | PK Supplies menu [IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/55403892.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/ppl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/yeee-1.jpg[/img]
For the players that don't like to spend their time on getting Items for PKing, we have added basic PKing equipments into the starter's bank.
[IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n7.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/4900/flawlscapejpegphixr.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/th_trnn.gif[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/Bez-nzvu-2.gif[/img]
But of course, Screenshots don't present our unique gameplay, so why don't you test it yourself?
[img]http://google.com/nophp/toplist/39488.png[/img] [url=http://www.Flawlscape.com]www.Flawlscape.com[/url]
If you do have any questions, feel free to ask. ;-) Feedback is also always welcome, also negative if it's not connected with flame. [/center]
Virus Scan [IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/2012_08_06_01_55_39_496x152.jpg[/img]

item.title: FlawlScape V4
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

I’d love to explain you how it works, but since I’m not the coder I don’t even know it myself in detail.
But what I can tell you is that it works perfect with a smoothly bankswitch system between Spawn and nonspawn rights.

Read full topic

item.title: FlawlScape V4
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

We are pretty sure that there is no way to smuggle items, and if there is, we still have logs and would remove the items and punish the smuggler.
As I mentioned above, these spawning rights are just temporary, therefore I don’t think that it will ruin the economy.

May I ask when Jagex gave their players the ability to spawn items?

Read full topic

item.title: FlawlScape V4
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

Loveandpower:

allowing players to spawn items is the first mistake of any economy, thats the current issue in runescape at the moment… somebody glitched and made 200b then spread it throughout the economy

Read full topic

item.title: FlawlScape V4
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

[quote=“eclipse rsps, post:11, topic:452981”][quote author=Ferity link=topic=555837.msg4070957#msg4070957 date=1344348679]
We are currently hosting an Event so you can spawn any item to start PKing instantly.
Don’t worry about the economy, there are different banks for spawnitems and non-spawned items!
[/quote]
your stupid lol.[/quote]

Why am I stupid?
It’s a cool event for the players to check new items out ect.
The previous days we gave donators and veterans the ability to spawn to find bugs to smuggle items, it now shuld be fixed to 100%.

Read full topic

item.title: FlawlScape V4
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

:S, I remember that really big array that spawns all of those items in the bank. mts

Good luck anyways!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:

I’ll ask around on the server if anyone has a well known MoparScape Account to reduce your waiting time as much as possible.

item.title: FlawlScape V4
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

[center]

snmkai4kopie.png756×103

Play Now | FlawlScape
Forums | FlawlScape

Download Client

Beginner’s Guide Video (Thanks to RmProduction for creating & editing the video!)

To watch PK Videos, simply search for ‘FlawlScape V4 PKing’ on Youtube!

FlawlScape is a server focused mostly on PKing. To ensure awesome PKing experiences, we do have smoothly switching for briders, perfectly working specials and the newest PK items like Chaotic Weapons or Nex gears.
In addition we have a PK shop in which you can buy items like Godswords, also we have an EP drops system which works exactly as it did on RuneScape.

We’re having friendly and active staff you may always ask when having a problem or chat with when you feel like talking. What’s special about us, is that we try our best to pay attention to the players’ opinions and suggestions, rather than what WE want.

Apart of our decent PvP system, we also offer PvM also against Bossmonsters like Tormented Demons, the Corporeal Beast or the Gwd Monsters.




In general we also have a few customized Interfaces to increase the gameplay of our players even more.

Player Information menu | Custom Options menu | PK Supplies menu

55403892.png732×335

yeee-1.jpg756×200

For the players that don’t like to spend their time on getting Items for PKing, we have added basic PKing equipments into the starter’s bank.

But of course, Screenshots don’t present our unique gameplay, so why don’t you test it yourself?


www.Flawlscape.com

If you do have any questions, feel free to ask.
Feedback is also always welcome, also negative if it’s not connected with flame.
[/center]
